Type Variants

These types T0, .. T9 are used for representing type variants. 

 testtypevariant :: (String,Int,Int)
 testtypevariant = $(autofmap $[t|(,,) T0|]) (+10) (+20) ("hello",1,1) -- ("hello",11,21)
